mapper.select: select dog_no as dogNo, member_no as memberNo, dog_name as dogName, type_name as dogType, (case type_size when 0 then '소형견' when 1 then '중형견' when 2 then '대형견' END) as dogSize, dog_gender as dogGender, dog_neutral as dogNeutral, dog_vacc as dogVacc, dog_age as dogAge, dog_weight as dogWeight, dog_photo as dogPhoto, dog_mbti as dogMbti, case dog_mbti when '0' then '3학년 그 선배' when '1' then '지각생' when '2' then '신비주의 전학생' when '3' then '밉지 않은 덜렁이' when '4' then '수학경시 우승자' when '5' then '자퇴생' when '6' then '문학소녀' when '7' then '미대 지망생' when '8' then '사기캐 반장' when '9' then '수다봇' when '10' then '댄스동아리 부회장' when '11' then '교내 아이돌' when '12' then '전교회장' when '13' then '급식실 도착 1등' when '14' then '헤르미온독' when '15' then '고등래퍼' END as dogMbtiName from dog_tbl d left join dog_type t on (d.dog_type_no = t.type_code) where member_no = #{_parameter} order by dog_no

select dog_no as dogNo, member_no as memberNo, dog_name as dogName, (type_name || case type_size when 0 then '(소형견)' when 1 then '(중형견)' when 2 then '(대형견)' END) as dogType, dog_gender as dogGender, dog_neutral as dogNeutral, dog_vacc as dogVacc, dog_age as dogAge, dog_weight as dogWeight, dog_photo as dogPhoto, dog_mbti as dogMbti, case dog_mbti when '0' then '3학년 그 선배' when '1' then '지각생' when '2' then '신비주의 전학생' when '3' then '밉지 않은 덜렁이' when '4' then '수학경시 우승자' when '5' then '자퇴생' when '6' then '문학소녀' when '7' then '미대 지망생' when '8' then '사기캐 반장' when '9' then '수다봇' when '10' then '댄스동아리 부회장' when '11' then '교내 아이돌' when '12' then '전교회장' when '13' then '급식실 도착 1등' when '14' then '헤르미온독' when '15' then '고등래퍼' END as dogMbtiName from dog_tbl d left join dog_type t on (d.dog_type_no = t.type_code) where dog_no = #{_parameter}
